local_intent: Perceive the white carton, approach and align to it with retries if needed, then verify visibility post-alignment.
assumptions: Carton is within scan area and detectable
Alignment can succeed within three retries
Visibility after alignment is a sufficient quick verification before grasp
coherence_with_global: Implements the approach phase of the global tree: scan (raster, 3 attempts, 5000 ms), detect (3000 ms), approach and align to white_carton with tolerance 0.02 and timeout 3000 ms, then verify visibility. Matches parameterization and sequencing of GLOBAL_BT while adding bounded retry per failure_and_recovery.
